defaultMessage: We need your social media login to determine that you are a real person.
This helps prevent fraud and helps keep our users safe.
We will also send you email updates should a suitable driver/rider be found for you.

You may choose to share the link to your social media account with potential carpoolers / donors so that they are empowered to verify who you are (and hopefully determine that you will be a good roadtrip companion/voter!)
